thread.title: `Supportive` Matt Damon says nobody is more misunderstood than `bestie` Ben AffleckUpdate
thread.title_full: `Supportive` Matt Damon says nobody is more misunderstood than `bestie` Ben AffleckUpdate

title: `Supportive` Matt Damon says nobody is more misunderstood than `bestie` Ben AffleckUpdate
text:
`Supportive` Matt Damon says nobody is more misunderstood than `bestie` Ben Affleck(Update) 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Thursday 1st October, 2015 
Matt Damon, who has always stood up for his best friend Ben Affleck, recently said that there is nobody who is more misunderstood in the industry than the latter. 
The 44-year-old actor said the media's misperception about the 'Gone Girl' star started early in his career especially after his relationship with Jennifer Lopez, reports People Magazine. 
'The Martian' star added that it was really painful for him to see his childhood friend in such a situation where he was just considered Lopez's boyfriend. 
Damon further said that through his work, Affleck has climbed from the bottom of the mountain all the way back up to the top. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News
